meanings.definition: At a favorable or suitable time
meanings.sent1: She arrived opportunely for the job interview.
meanings.sent2: The train arrived opportunely, just as I reached the platform.
meanings.sent3: The cake opportunistically jumped out of the oven when it was perfectly baked.
meanings.sent4: The sun opportunistically peeked through the clouds, illuminating the garden.
meanings.sent5: The umbrella opened opportunely as the rain started pouring down.
